summary: This document is an email chain from March 2016 discussing scheduling a meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves a Senior Litigation Counsel and Human Trafficking & Project Safe Childhood Coordinator from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating official interest in the Epstein case years before his 2019 arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the meeting being scheduled; the email chain's purpose is to arrange a discussion about him.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting re: Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting to discuss Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for Tuesday at 4:00 PM.

keyFacts: A meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein was being scheduled by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in March 2016.
The correspondence involves a Senior Litigation Counsel and Human Trafficking & Project Safe Childhood Coordinator, indicating the meeting was for official law enforcement/business purposes.
This shows official investigative interest in Epstein by the SDNY years prior to his 2019 arrest.
